membership.description: The membership status of the logged-in athlete.

admin.description: Whether the currently logged-in athlete is an administrator of this club.

owner.description: Whether the currently logged-in athlete is the owner of this club.

following_count.description: The number of athletes in the club that the logged-in athlete follows.

profile_medium.description: URL to a 60x60 pixel profile picture.

cover_photo.description: URL to a ~1185x580 pixel cover photo.

cover_photo_small.description: URL to a ~360x176  pixel cover photo.

state.description: The club's state or geographical region.

featured.description: Whether the club is featured or not.

verified.description: Whether the club is verified or not.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 1 -> "meta", 2 -> "summary", 3 -> "detail"

id.description: The unique identifier of this announcement.

club_id.description: The unique identifier of the club this announcements was made in.

created_at.description: The time at which this announcement was created.

success.description: Whether the application for membership was successfully submitted

active.description: Whether the membership is currently active
